page.title: 10CLYRO PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: Clyro Primary School was officially opened in{February 1977}by County Councillor,Mr.H.E. Williams.The new building replaced the village school which had served the community since{1860. } The present school is a coeducational Church in Wales controlled Primary School. The school caters for pupils between the ages of{ {four and eleven years}and was designed for{70 pupils.} The building is of a modified {Open Plan Design,}consisting of three teaching ares with adjoing work space.The infant/reception area is self contained and adjoins the hall. Leading off the other side of the hall is the junior area with two teaching spaces. Incorporated into the junior area is a retreat for noisy/quiet work and is used by the whole school.
